hero.title: Experience Teotihuacán from the Sky
hero.description: Discover the magic of Teotihuacán with our unforgettable hot air balloon flights. Soar over ancient pyramids, vibrant landscapes, and breathtaking sunrises for a once-in-a-lifetime adventure.

descriptions.classic: The Experience: Join a small group of adventurers in our signature compartmented baskets. Unlike open "cattle-class" baskets, our design gives everyone their own protected corner of the sky. It is the perfect balance of social atmosphere and personal space.
descriptions.journey: The Experience: We designed this for the traveller with zero patience for logistics. We handle the round-trip transport, guide you through the pyramids, and immerse you in local traditions. Includes a survival kit (hat & water) so you just focus on the view.
descriptions.transport: The Experience: Designed for the traveller who wants the full story without the logistical stress. We orchestrate the entire itinerary: from the door-to-door transport and the precision flight at morning first light, to your direct access to the pyramids. Seamless execution, from pickup to return.
descriptions.open: The Experience: Designed for the traveller who wants the full story without the logistical stress. We orchestrate the entire itinerary: from the door-to-door transport and the precision flight at morning first light, to your direct access to the pyramids. Seamless execution, from pickup to return.
descriptions.proposal: The Experience: You only have one chance to get this right; we ensure it’s flawless. We orchestrate the exact moment the "Marry Me?", while you enjoy total privacy in the sky. We handle the timing, the flowers, and the cameras. You just bring the ring.
descriptions.anniversary: The Experience: Dinner is predictable; the view at 2,000 feet is not. We curate the perfect celebratory atmosphere to honor your journey together. Upon landing, we mark the occasion with a celebratory "Happy Anniversary" banner and a toast. A shared moment, perfectly executed.
descriptions.birthday: The Experience: Why celebrate on the ground when you can float above it? Start your personal new year with a sunrise spectacle. We handle the festive details: a "Happy Birthday" banner upon landing, a celebratory slice of cake, and the warmth of a traditional Mexican morning.
descriptions.vip: The Experience: The definitive Teotihuacán immersion. We curate a seamless private journey from your hotel door to the sky, and down to the ceremonial underworld. Elevate the adventure with French Champagne, waiter service, and a historian-led exploration of the ruins. Pure exclusivity.
